title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.37 - Public cargo ramp and apron area charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.37 - Public cargo ramp and apron area charges

State Regulations

For an aircraft remaining on the public cargo ramp and
apron area for more than 10 minutes after the manager of the air terminal has
directed that such aircraft be removed because of congestion of aircraft upon
the said area, the urgency for making space available for other aircraft, snow
removal, or other operational requirements, which said notice shall not in any
event be given until the aircraft has been on such area for 60 minutes; for
each additional 30 minutes or fraction thereof.. $5..................... Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.37

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
